summary: Wire frontend runtime/deadlock change IDs to real upgrade migrations and auto-recover placement-paused frontend updates

changes.description: Upgrade now executes frontend runtime policy reconciliation to rebalance HA replicas and normalize runtime policy across varnish/nginx/php-fpm.
Upgrade now detects placement-paused frontend updates and forces a stop-first recovery rollout so pending nginx/php-fpm updates can converge.
